---
category: news
title: "Latest Georgia Tech Research in Natural Language Processing Derives Insight from Growing Volume of Digital Text"
excerpt: "Natural language processing (NLP) is a growing cornerstone of artificial intelligence and allows people and machines to act based on insights gleaned from digital text. New NLP research from Georgia Tech is allowing for patterns to be uncovered in this text and broaden the understanding of how to build better computer applications that derive value from written language."
